com.connectlife.coreserver.configmanager

Class ConfigSqliteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectlife.coreserver.configmanager.ConfigSqliteManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Config

    public class ConfigSqliteManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Config
    This is the ConfigSqliteManager for this application. This class permit to read and write object in SQLite database of the application.
    Author:
    Eric Pinet (pineri01@gmail.com)
    2015-09-07

    • Field Detail

      • ItemConfig

        public static java.lang.String[][] ItemConfig
        Default configuration for the database Adding all config and it's default value and type here. This config will be created automatically in database. If you add new config, change the database version in DatabaseStructure.
